skdetail:

Invocation Name: hockey countdown
des: Open the skill using your Alexa and it will tell you how many days there is until the NHL season starts! Perfect for huge hockey fans, or people that need to know how long it is going to take until October second...
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
